description.displayText: Aisha, comes across as a very pleasant and genuine person. The kids loved her and can't wait for her to come back.
description.originalText: Aisha, comes across as a very pleasant and genuine person. The kids loved her and can't wait for her to come back.

description.displayText: Aishah B. Was hired in March 7, 20 as a part-time nanny for 3 children, ages 7, 6, and baby of seven months at a time. I would recommend her work. Aishah Has demonstrated responsibilities in taking care of our children. She is kind trustworthy and great with the kids. Aishah always keep the children occupied and safe. She also has good communication skills along with doing creative things with them. Aishah was also flexible when I needed to change workdays. She also practice good healthy hygiene and discipline according to the our rules. One thing I did like about her is that she always send pictures of what the children were doing or what she was doing with them. Aishah needed more hours and has taken a full time nanny position. She will truly me missed. I would hire her again if needed and if she was available.
